beats.narration: Mile 6. Trinidad Lake Roller Coaster. Six-mile series of hills in the state park. Packs stay together but legs start to sting.

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 24
beats.narration: Mile 24. 18-Mile Climb. The main selection. 18 miles up to 9 thousand ft with grades up to 18%. Heat, altitude, and gradient blow up groups.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 65
beats.narration: Mile 65. Highest Point & Descent. After climbing to the highest point, screaming descent with mud and deep do-not-change-your-line ruts for about a mile.

beats.narration: Mile 100. Chunky Sector. The chunkiest part of the course. Most susceptible to flatting. Right before fast run-in to town.
